1 #include "masterslave/task/boundingbox.h"
2 
3 BoundingBox::BoundingBox(ros::NodeHandle& nh, Eigen::Affine3d TCP, Eigen::Vector3d RemoteCenterOfMotion, Eigen::Vector3d boundingBoxSizeVector, double rcmDistance): nh_(nh)
4 {
5  TCP_old = TCP;
6  RCM = RemoteCenterOfMotion;
7  boundingBoxSize = boundingBoxSizeVector;
8  rcmDistanceZ = rcmDistance;
9  upperLeftCorner = RCM + Eigen::Vector3d(boundingBoxSize(0)/2,boundingBoxSize(1)/2,-rcmDistanceZ);
10  lowerRightCorner = upperLeftCorner - boundingBoxSize;
11  centerOfBoundingBox = RCM - Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,rcmDistanceZ+boundingBoxSize(2)/2);
12  centerPub = nh_.advertise<geometry_msgs::Point>("/vrep/CenterOfBoundingBox",1);
13 
14  geometry_msgs::Point center;
15  tf::pointEigenToMsg(centerOfBoundingBox,center);
16  centerPub.publish(center);
17 }
18 
19 bool BoundingBox::checkBoundingBoxTCP(Eigen::Affine3d TCP)
20 {
21  geometry_msgs::Point center;
22  tf::pointEigenToMsg(centerOfBoundingBox,center);
23  centerPub.publish(center);
24  Eigen::Affine3d velocity = TCP_old.inverse()*TCP;
25  for(int i=0;i<3;i++)
26  {
27  if(TCP.translation()(i)>upperLeftCorner[i] && velocity.translation()(i)>0)
28  {
29  return false;
30  }
31  else if(TCP.translation()(i)<lowerRightCorner[i] && velocity.translation()(i)<0)
32  {
33  return false;
34  }
35  }
36  return true;
37 }
38 
39 void BoundingBox::setTCPDistance(double value)
40 {
41  rcmDistanceZ = value;
42  allThingsSet += 1;
43 }
44 void BoundingBox::setTCP(Eigen::Affine3d TCP)
45 {
46  TCP_old = TCP;
47  allThingsSet += 1 << 1;
48 }
49 
50 void BoundingBox::setRCM(Eigen::Vector3d remoteCenterOfMotion)
51 {
52  RCM = remoteCenterOfMotion;
53  allThingsSet += 1 << 2;
54 }
55 
56 void BoundingBox::setBoundingBox(Eigen::Vector3d value)
57 {
58  boundingBoxSize = value;
59  allThingsSet += 1 << 3;
60 }
